item.title: What is thy name?
item.description: A brief discussion about the naming convention of the observations in spatial transcriptomics.

item.title: Thesis Epilogue
item.description: An excerpt from the Epilogue of my PhD thesis. These are the lessons I’ve learnt, the predictions I have, and the hopes I harbor.
